title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising thier code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
content: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authorization means confirming your own identity, whereas authorizaiton means being allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: I have really loved learning about ORMs.  It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL!
